issue.title: [C++/Python] Update arrow/python/pyarrow_api.h
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3636](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3636). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This file should be updated to one generated by Cython 0.29. Also based on a conversation with Stefan Behnel, we should be able to change the `cdef public api` statements in pyarrow/public-api.pxi to simply `cdef api`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3636?focusedCommentId=16667844) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2854
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2854>
